citation: Inland Fisheries (Seasons and Waters) Amendment Order 2016 (Tas)
text:
Inland Fisheries (Seasons and Waters) Amendment Order 2016

I make the following order under section 197 of the Inland Fisheries Act 1995 .

12 May 2016

JEREMY ROCKLIFF

Minister for Primary Industries and Water

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Inland Fisheries (Seasons and Waters) Amendment Order 2016 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on 1 August 2016.

3. Principal Order
    In this order, the Inland Fisheries (Seasons and Waters) Order 1996 is referred to as the Principal Order.

4.
    The amendments effected by this clause have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Inland Fisheries (Seasons and Waters) Order 1996 .

5.
    The amendments effected by this clause have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Inland Fisheries (Seasons and Waters) Order 1996 .

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 8 June 2016

This order is administered in the Department of Primary Industries, Parks, Water and Environment.
